name: Gliding Game(Commission)
description:
Hey! this is my first project ive uploaded to itch.io, i will probably add more soon

this is a simple gliding platformer game, made in unity, base game was made for a commission, has a few basic mechanics including moving enemies, and gravity changes, really a simple project. maybe ill add more to it in the future. most likley not though, Donations welcome but not expected, i hope you enjoy!
